title: Muthoot Finance net profit surges 4% in third quarter - The Financial Express
content:
1. Muthoot Finance net profit surges 4% in third quarter  The Financial Express
  2. Muthoot Finance Q3 results: Net profit up 4% at Rs 1,044 cr  Economic Times
  3. Muthoot Finance post 4 per cent rise in net profit Q3  BusinessLine
  4. Muthoot Finance Q3 results: Net profit rises 4% to Rs 1,044 crore  Business Today
  5. Muthoot Finance net profit up 4 pc at Rs 1,044 cr in Dec qtr  Devdiscourse
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The finance company which also operates a home loan, microfinance and insurance broking subsidiaries said that net profit of the gold loan division increased 4% y-o-y to Rs 1,028.9 crore .
